member.name: M:MaxLib.WebServer.Benchmark.BenchmarkCase.Setup(MaxLib.WebServer.Benchmark.BenchmarkTask)
member.summary: This function runs before each test and prepares the next test
member.param: the target where the preparation has to be done

member.name: M:MaxLib.WebServer.Benchmark.BenchmarkCase.Verify(MaxLib.WebServer.Benchmark.BenchmarkTask)
member.summary: Verifies the result if everything went well. If something happened this will call any .
member.param: the target which has to be checked
